full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 50 of 261 1190 LC6VMAX2 Kate - direct thought Epstein would think of the girl? A. She said, I think she would be a good fit for him. Q. After Epstein engaged in sex acts with you during massages in Maxwell's house in London, did you ever see Epstein and Maxwell again? A. Yes. Q. Over the next few years, how frequently did you see them? A. I saw them -- do you mean how many individual occasions or how many -- can you be specific? Q. Sure. Over the next few years, about how many times a year did you see them? A. How many times per year? It was sporadic. The first couple of years, more; probably five times the first couple of years. Q. And on the times that you would see them, would you see them just one time or would you see them multiple times? A. Multiple times. Q. Do you remember the exact details and dates of every single time you saw Epstein and Maxwell? A. No. Q. Do some details and events stand out more in your mind than others? A. Yes. Q. I want to talk to you about the time period from when you were 17 years old to your early twenties. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012801
